name: Kellie's Castle
description: An unfinished mansion built by Scottish planter William Kellie-Smith, offering a glimpse into colonial history and rumored to be haunted.

name: Lost World of Tambun
description: A theme park featuring water attractions, hot springs, a petting zoo, and adventure activities, set amidst limestone hills.

name: Perak Cave Temple
description: A Chinese Buddhist temple set within a limestone cave, known for its impressive murals and a large golden Buddha statue.

name: Ipoh Railway Station
description: A historic railway station known for its majestic colonial architecture, often referred to as the 'Taj Mahal of Ipoh.'
address: Jalan Panglima Bukit Gantang Wahab, 30000 Ipoh, Perak

name: Gua Tempurung
description: One of the largest limestone caves in Peninsular Malaysia, offering guided tours through its impressive caverns.
address: Pusat Pelancongan Gua Tempurung, 31600 Gopeng, Perak

name: Han Chin Pet Soo Museum
description: Malaysia's first Hakka tin mining museum, offering insights into the tin mining history and Hakka culture.
